DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study ( 1 ) examine whether leave ventricular function impair woman preeclampsia relative healthy pregnant control , ( 2 ) examine whether endothelial function impair woman preeclampsia relative healthy pregnant control , ( 3 ) examine whether post partum impairment leave ventricular endothelial function .
DOC.criteria: > 18 year age Case : Clinical diagnosis preeclampsia , Control : Systolic BP < 140 mmHg diastolic BP < 90 mmHg Known hypertension cardiovascular disease Diabetes/gestational diabetes Multiple gestation
